message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Broad-based green close with many names finishing near day highs. PSU/financials/metals led (NHPC, SJVN, HUDCO, HINDCOPPER, CHOLAFIN, ABCAPITAL). IT momentum (PERSISTENT, COFORGE) stayed firm but looks extended. No material breakdowns on the screen. Maintain a cautiously bullish bias; favor breakouts over bottom-fishing.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Strong close near day high after range expansion; momentum continuation likely above today’s high", "price": 272.20},
    {"symbol": "NHPC", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Tight range, close near high; PSU power bid strong—clean trigger above intraday high", "price": 87.90},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Consolidation near highs; strength above resistance can extend trend", "price": 346.50},
    {"symbol": "VOLTAS", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Strong session; clearing day high signals continuation from consolidation", "price": 1416.00},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Persistent uptrend with strength in defense/PSU; watch a push through round-number resistance", "price": 410.50},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Metals bid; momentum continuation above recent intraday resistance", "price": 345.00},
    {"symbol": "IRCTC", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Tight flag; print through day high can trigger follow-through", "price": 717.50},
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Steady accumulation; push through resistance can open room to 312–315", "price": 305.50},
    {"symbol": "RBLBANK", "signal": "Hold; add on strength", "reason": "We hold; reclaiming 300 with volume—consider add only above 305 with tight stop", "price": 305.00},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on breakout", "reason": "We hold; price hovering near resistance—add only on a clean push above day high", "price": 2480.00},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Hold; add only on trigger", "reason": "Range-bound; avoid averaging lower—consider add only above 94", "price": 94.00}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 18233.50,
    "total_value": 25548.30,
    "holdings_count": 3,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2385.00 (CMP 2456.30)",
      "RBLBANK: 10 units @ 291.60 (CMP 299.55)",
      "IDBI: 20 units @ 93.46 (CMP 93.15)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU strength: NHPC, SJVN, HUDCO, BEL, HINDCOPPER all closed strong—prefer breakout entries above today’s highs.",
    "Financials constructive: CHOLAFIN firm (trigger ~1710), ABCAPITAL strong near 305; RBLBANK watch 305 for add.",
    "IT momentum intact but extended: PERSISTENT, COFORGE up—avoid chasing; wait for pullbacks or fresh bases.",
    "Realty strength: PRESTIGE, OBEROIRLTY gained; risk of chase—prefer pullbacks (e.g., PRESTIGE ~1640–1650) over breakouts at highs.",
    "Defense names (HAL, BEML, GRSE) strong but extended; treat as buy-on-dips, not breakouts.",
    "Metals bid: HINDCOPPER >345 and SAIL >131.7 are cleaner continuation triggers than laggards.",
    "Avoid low-priced high-volatility entries like IDEA despite volume; risk/reward poor for our small portfolio.",
    "Risk management for current holdings: BSE trail stop ~2390; RBLBANK stop ~286; IDBI stop ~90.",
    "For Monday: prioritize 1–2 small adds from NHPC, BEL, or ABCAPITAL on triggers to keep position sizing prudent."
  ]
}
